contents:
如果心情好，出门就是《雨中曲》

我记得小时候喜欢下雨天跟着《阿甘正传》的卡拉OK学唱“雨的旋律”，一边作多愁善感状 ：））
Oh Listen to the rhythm of the falling rain
Telling me just what a fool I've been
I wish that it would go and let me cry in vain
And let me be alone again

The only girl/boy I care about has gone away
Looking for a brand new start
But little does she/he know that when she/he left that day
Along with her/him she/he took my heart

Rain please tell me now does that seem fair
For her/him to steal my heart away when she/he don't care?
I can't love another when my hearts somewhere far away

Rain won't you tell her/him that I love her/him so
Please ask the sun to set her/him heart aglow
Rain in her/his heart and let the love we knew start to grow
